data.name: valModuleName.ErrorMessage
data.value: You must enter a Name for the Module

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Provide a description of the module.

data.name: plSupportedFeatures.Help
data.value: These options are updated automatically depending on the module and the features that the developer has chosen to support.

data.name: plUpgradeable.Help
data.value: If checked, this module runs special code on upload for upgrading.

data.name: plPortable.Help
data.value: If checked, this module supports importing and exporting of content.

data.name: plSearchable.Help
data.value: If checked, this module supports indexing and searching of content.

data.name: plPremium.Help
data.value: Premium modules are only available to specific portals

data.name: plVersion.Help
data.value: Enter the version number for this module in the form ##.##.##

data.name: plDefinitions.Help
data.value: You can select a Module Definition and optionally delete it using the "Delete Definition" link.

data.name: plDefinition.Help
data.value: You can ceate a new Definition by entereing the name here and clicking the "Add Definition" link

data.name: plFriendlyName.Help
data.value: This is the Friendly Name of the Module

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Module Definitions

The Super User can manage the Desktop Modules installed on the system.

data.name: plFolderName.Help
data.value: Enter a Folder Name for the location of the Module's files.

data.name: valFolderName.ErrorMessage
data.value: You must enter a Folder Name for the location of the Module's files.

data.name: plBusinessClass.Help
data.value: This is the Controller Class for the module. If the module supports optional Interfaces, such as ISearchable and IPortable, this is the class where these interfaces are implemented.

data.name: plModuleName.Help
data.value: This is the name of the module - it will uniquely identify the module in the system.

data.name: plCacheTime.Help
data.value: This is the default Cache Time to be used for this Module Definition.

data.name: AddModule.ErrorMessage
data.value: There is already a Module with this name. You cannot create a new Module with the same name.

data.name: AddDefinition.ErrorMessage
data.value: There is already a Module Definition with this name. You cannot create a new Module Definition using the same name.

data.name: MissingDefinition.ErrorMessage
data.value: You need to provide a Name for the new Definition.

data.name: UpdateCache.ErrorMessage
data.value: The CacheTime must be an Integer value.

data.name: plManifest.Help
data.value: Select an existing manifest file and select Install ( optional ).

data.name: InstallManifest.ErrorMessage
data.value: Error Installing Selected Module Manifest File

data.name: plCompatibleVersions.Help
data.value: (Optional) A regular expression which describes the module compatibility with the host application based on version. A sample regular expression would be ^[0-9]{1}[0-9]{1}.[0-9]{1}[0-9]{1}.[0-9]{1}[0-9]{1}$ - indicating the module is compatible with all versions from 00.00.00 to 99.99.99

data.name: valFriendlyName.ErrorMessage
data.value: A Module must have a Friendly Name

data.name: valVersion.ErrorMessage
data.value: A Module must have a Version number in the form of ##.##.##
